title: I got a two week ban, because I did bad?
body:
Alright, so some backstory. I have been away from league for about three years. I just came back about a month ago. I que up for a normal game as Nid and I do HORRIBLE. Well, like, 2/5. It happens. Anyway, the entire game I'm being flamed by three of my teammates who I assume end up reporting me at the end of the game. I go to log on last night and I have a thirteen day ban because of it. 

How is that fair? Do people even read the chatlogs when they ban? I've been taking care of my sick grandmother all by myself and League is my ONLY form of entertainment. But since I was 'toxic' and did bad that one game, I got a thirteen day suspension. How is that fair at all? I don't even think I was that mean. I'm always friendly in chat, but these people we're harassing me so bad that I suppose I wasn't 100% kind to them.

I've seen chatlogs that get people banned, and I hardly think that this is deserving of a thirteen day suspension. :(

For your reading pleasure.
